page_title: Dave Vanian and the Phantom Chords
description: '''Dave Vanian and the Phantom Chords''' (a.k.a. '''(the) Phantom Chords''') were a 1990s [[Music of the United Kingdom|British]] rock band, featuring [[The Damned (band)|The Damned]]'s [[Dave Vanian]] on vocals. The band's style is a fusion of [[rockabilly]] and [[gothic rock]], which has been classified as [[gothabilly]]. They performed a mixture of [[cover version|covers]] and new material.
